basics.label: Kitchen Manager, Catering and Events Chef
basics.summary: I am a kitchen manager with six years in BOH operations. Demonstrated team leadership with excellent staff management skills.I am also a Motivated chef with 5+ years experience in fast-paced restaurant kitchens.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Kitchen Manager / Catering and events chef
work.summary: Managed kitchen operations for high grossing, fast-paced fair concession kitchen. Developed variety of menu items catering to customers with food allergies...
highlights: Inspected dining and serving areas to ensure cleanliness...

highlights: Regularly inquired about member or guest satisfaction
